title: His Simple Wish
description: **Find out what's next for Xander and Ashley while the passion between Drake and Samantha unfolds in His Simple Wish**Plus sized Samantha Mayfair has known Drake Winslow her entire life and despises him...mostly. Deep down she's locked away her feelings for him, but coming from two different worlds, she knows Drake would never fall for a girl like her. At the Boone wedding reception, billionaire Drake Winslow spots the girl of his dreams. Once a renown playboy, he vows to change his ways for outspoken Samantha.As Samantha continues to reject Drake's advances, she begins to question her feelings. Will she finally give in to him or will a provocative photo with a mysterious woman prove that Drake will never change.
author: Liliana Rhodes
